DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate addition new technology resin modify glass-ionomer comparison resin infiltration treat post-orthodontic white spot lesion ; apply patient 's mouth ; reveal material clinical satisfactory performance inside oral cavity overcome high expensive cost treat clinical case
DOC.brief_title: One Year Clinical Evaluation White Spot Lesions Treated With Newly Introduced Resin Modified Glass Ionomer Comparison Resin Infiltration Anterior Teeth Split Mouth Technique
DOC.detailed_description: Roles responsibility : - Shaimaa Mohammed ( SH.M . ) : Operator author.Specialist Air-Force Specialized Hospital . - Mohamed Riad ( M.R . ) : Main supervisor , data monitoring auditing , Professor , Conservative Dentistry Department , Cairo University . - Asma Harhash ( A.H. ) : Co-supervisor , outcome assessor data collection , Associate Professor , Russian University . - Omnia Magdy Moustafa ( O.M . ) : Baseline data collection , recruitment , sequence generation , allocation concealment , patient retention take participant consent : Assistant lecturer , Conservative Dentistry Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine Cairo University . - Ghada Ahmed ( G.A . ) : Data entry auditing ; Assistant lecturer , Conservative Dentistry Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Russian University . Intervention : A- Preoperative clinical assessment : 1 . Explain patient need toward aesthetic need 2 . Digital photos white spot lesion 3 . Recording number white spot lesion site . ( SH.M . ) apply material patient mouth ( Split mouth technique ) accord manufacturer 's instruction . - Intervention : resin modify glass ionomer cement varnish : Vanishâ„¢ xt Extended Contact Varnish ( 3M ESPE Dental ) - Comparator : resin infiltration ( Dental Milestones Guaranteed , Germany ) . ( A.H ) ( SH.M ) ass outcome measure follow time : immediately after,1 day , 1 week,1 month,3 month , 6 month , 12 month
DOC.criteria: 1 . PostOrthodontic patient include clinical trial toll age 35 year . 2 . Patients good general health . 3 . Patients agree consent commit followup period . 4 . Fully erupt anterior teeth cavitated lesion . 5 . At least one spot lesion side jaw 1 . Patients systemic disease may affect normal healing . 2 . Patient bad oral hygiene . 3 . Tetracycline fluorsis stain . 4 . Patients could/would participate time followup . 5 . Untreated periodontal disease allow . 6 . Active caries defective Restorations 6 anterior teeth . 7 . Bleaching history 8 . Patients participate 1 dental study . 9 . Patient receive fluoride varnish orthodontic treatment .
